summary: Tested all requested changes for Remove button, search functionality, header bug fix, and 'vs' text addition. All primary features working correctly with minor authentication flow observations.

integration_issues.flow: My Predictions page access when authenticated
integration_issues.issue: Authentication session may not persist properly - redirects to login after nickname setup

passed_tests: ✅ Remove button displays instead of Refresh on match cards (226 Remove buttons found)
✅ Remove button has correct 'Remove' text and Trash2 icon
✅ Remove button functionality deletes prediction from database when clicked
✅ Header correctly shows Login/Register when NOT logged in
✅ Header correctly hides Login/Register when user IS authenticated
✅ My Predictions page redirects to login when not authenticated (correct behavior)
✅ Search input exists on Predictions page with club name placeholder
✅ Search filtering works instantly by club name
✅ Search clear button (×) appears and functions correctly
✅ 'No matches found' message displays for empty search results
✅ 'vs' text appears between home and away team names (228 instances found)
✅ Filter tabs (All, Live, Upcoming, Finished) are present and clickable
✅ Summary cards display correctly when authenticated
✅ Homepage matches load correctly (no regression - 113+ matches)
✅ Global search in header functions correctly
✅ Vote buttons and match interaction work as expected
✅ Backend API success rate: 94.4% (17/18 tests passed)
✅ Registration and login flow works correctly
✅ Authentication modal appears when trying to predict without login

success_percentage.backend: 94.4% (17/18 tests - expected failure for non-existent test user)
success_percentage.frontend: 90% (All core features working, minor auth session issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Consider investigating authentication session persistence after nickname setup - users may need to re-login to access My Predictions page. This appears to be related to external OAuth flow redirect handling.
